text.p: Note the last row in your result, and think about what equation it represents. Is the system consistent? If so, does it have a unique solution?

choice.text: The system is consistent and has a unique solution
The system is consistent but has more than one solution

font.p: The last row represents [mathjaxinline]0x_1+0x_2=1[/mathjaxinline]. There are no values of [mathjaxinline]x_1[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]x_2[/mathjaxinline] that satisfy this equation.
